body_html:
@SsnL - There are a ton of micro-content changes that need to be made throughout the docs.

I will definitely go over the formulas again once this PR goes through, and add \text{}, to change the font, anywhere it is missing. At this point, I'm confused about what has been changed and what hasn't...in my last commit, these were all fixed...so I'm not sure what you are seeing...how are you actually reviewing the docs? Can you let me know what you are looking at that is causing a hang-up?

In any case, you shouldn't let the wrong font on a formula be a blocker for this PR...happy to edit those in a new PR once this one goes through, as we discussed, and as I've written here a few times.

Thanks for your help.

body:
@SsnL - There are a *ton* of micro-content changes that need to be made throughout the docs. 

I will definitely go over the formulas again once this PR goes through, and add \text{}, to change the font,  anywhere it is missing. At this point, I'm confused about what has been changed and what hasn't...in my last commit, these were all fixed...so I'm not sure what you are seeing...how are you actually reviewing the docs? Can you let me know what you are looking at that is causing a hang-up?

In any case, you shouldn't let the wrong font on a formula be a blocker for this PR...happy to edit those in a new PR once this one goes through, as we discussed, and as I've written here a few times. 

Thanks for your help.
